description:
18.7 avectorscope
Convert input audio to a video output, representing the audio vector
scope.

The filter is used to measure the difference between channels of stereo
audio stream. A monaural signal, consisting of identical left and right
signal, results in straight vertical line. Any stereo separation is visible
as a deviation from this line, creating a Lissajous figure.
If the straight (or deviation from it) but horizontal line appears this
indicates that the left and right channels are out of phase.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: avectorscope

options.description:
Set the vectorscope mode.

Available values are:

‘lissajous’

Lissajous rotated by 45 degrees.

‘lissajous_xy’

Same as above but not rotated.

‘polar’

Shape resembling half of circle.

Default value is ‘lissajous’.
options.name: mode

options.description: Set the output frame rate. Default value is 25.
options.name: rate

options.description: Set the video size for the output. For the syntax of this option, check the (ffmpeg-utils)"Video size" section in the ffmpeg-utils manual. Default value is 400x400.
options.name: size

options.description: Specify the red, green, blue and alpha contrast. Default values are 40, 160, 80 and 255. Allowed range is [0, 255].
options.name: rc

options.description: Specify the red, green, blue and alpha contrast. Default values are 40, 160, 80 and 255. Allowed range is [0, 255].
options.name: gc

options.description: Specify the red, green, blue and alpha contrast. Default values are 40, 160, 80 and 255. Allowed range is [0, 255].
options.name: bc

options.description: Specify the red, green, blue and alpha contrast. Default values are 40, 160, 80 and 255. Allowed range is [0, 255].
options.name: ac

options.description: Specify the red, green, blue and alpha fade. Default values are 15, 10, 5 and 5. Allowed range is [0, 255].
options.name: rf

options.description: Specify the red, green, blue and alpha fade. Default values are 15, 10, 5 and 5. Allowed range is [0, 255].
options.name: gf

options.description: Specify the red, green, blue and alpha fade. Default values are 15, 10, 5 and 5. Allowed range is [0, 255].
options.name: bf

options.description: Specify the red, green, blue and alpha fade. Default values are 15, 10, 5 and 5. Allowed range is [0, 255].
options.name: af

options.description: Set the zoom factor. Default value is 1. Allowed range is [0, 10]. Values lower than 1 will auto adjust zoom factor to maximal possible value.
options.name: zoom

options.description:
Set the vectorscope drawing mode.

Available values are:

‘dot’

Draw dot for each sample.

‘line’

Draw line between previous and current sample.

‘aaline’

Draw anti-aliased line between previous and current sample.

Default value is ‘dot’.
options.name: draw

options.description:
Specify amplitude scale of audio samples.

Available values are:

‘lin’

Linear.

‘sqrt’

Square root.

‘cbrt’

Cubic root.

‘log’

Logarithmic.
options.name: scale

options.description: Swap left channel axis with right channel axis.
options.name: swap

options.description:
Mirror axis.

‘none’

No mirror.

‘x’

Mirror only x axis.

‘y’

Mirror only y axis.

‘xy’

Mirror both axis.
options.name: mirror
